TEXT.TITLE: K MART <KM> UNIT BUYS TEXAS LAND
TEXT.BODY: K Mart Apparel Corp, a unit of K Mart Corp, said it purchased 35 acres 15 miles east of downtown Dallas from Baker Associates No. 2 Joint Venture. Financial details were not disclosed. K Mart said it will construct a 456,000-square-foot distribution center and 15,000 square feet of office space on the site. Reuter
